author: Bonedaddy
title: A lively magnet set great for any collector!
review:
As a collector who primarily focuses on space and fantasy themed sets i find it difficult to go out of my "comfort zone" and purchase a set that i don't normally collect. However, once i saw this magnet set i just had to have it! The characters just look so lively, like each one has a story. This is the ONLY pirate set i have purchased since coming out of my dark ages and i display it proudly in my cubicle at work.

Here's the good stuff,

Pros

  • GREAT looking minifigs! If all pirate figures look like this i might have to reconsider which themes i collect.
  • The minifigs are NOT glued to the magnet! I can take them off and pose them or swap accessories as much as i want.
  • Accessories! Each character has his own hat, weapon, and "extra" (spyglass, parrot, hook)

Cons

  • Building experience scored low because you pretty much just take them out of the packaging and stick them on a wall. Not very involved, but hey, they're magnets.
  • (not really a con)

I started collecting magnet sets once i heard that LEGO was going to be gluing the new ones down. I don't mind the lower quality chinese models but i DO want to be able to use those magnets for other things if i so choose. This set was the first of many magnet sets that i purchase and it is by far my favorite!

Buy it now if you still can!
